attributes.action: Issue commemorative “Thank You Key Workers” and/or “Thank You NHS” 50p coin
attributes.additional_details: To provide a permanent and constant reminder to the general public of how valued and important we view key workers and NHS
attributes.background: Issue commemorative “Thank You Key Workers” and/or “Thank You NHS” 50p coin

rejection.details:
Coins are manufactured and issued by the Royal Mint, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more here: https://www.royalmint.com/discover/uk-coins/coin-design-and-specifications/.
